decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The proposed additional glass panel to be inserted to the bottom of the window between grid 10-11 at fourth floor of the east elevation, and as indicated on drawing reference 11171-A-D1-07-02, shall be fitted with translucent glass prior to the first occupation of the relevant residential unit and shall be maintained as such in perpetuity.

REASON: To ensure that the development is undertaken in accordance with the details submitted with the application and to safeguard the privacy and residential amenity of neighbouring properties located in Balfe Street, in accordance with policy D3 of Islington's Unitary Development Plan 2002.
